text: Lloyd B. Omdahl (January 5, 1931 - April 14, 2024) was an American politician. He was the 34th Lieutenant Governor of North Dakota. Omdahl died in Grand Forks, North Dakota on April 14, 2024, at the age of 93.Former North Dakota Lt. Gov. Lloyd Omdahl dies at age 93 ==References== Category:Lieutenant Governors of North Dakota Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Lloyd Omdahl
